#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

int main() {
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
  cin.tie(0);
  int T; cin >> T;
  while (T--) {
    string s; cin >> s;
    int n = s.size();
    vector<int> on(n+1, 0);
    vector<int> off(n+1, 0);
    int noff = 0, non = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
      if (s[i] == 'O') ++noff;
      else ++non;
    }
    for (int i = 0; i <= n; ++i) {
      if (i) {
	on[i] += on[i-1];
	off[n-i] += off[n-(i-1)];
      }
      on[i] += s[i] == 'N';
      off[n-i] += s[n-i] == 'O';
    }
    int ans = min(noff, non);
    for (int i = 0; i <= n; ++i) {
//       cout << "i: " << i << " " << ans << " on: " << on[i] << " off: " << off[i] << endl;
      ans = min(ans, on[i] + off[i+1]);
    }
    cout << ans << endl;
  }
}
